com.magknight.route.utility

Class RouteCalculationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.magknight.route.utility.RouteCalculationUtils

  • public class RouteCalculationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    RouteCalculationUtils implements important methods utilized during path calculation for legs.
    Since:
    5/20/2020
    Author:
    Omar Alam

      • convertGeoLineToVectorLine

        public static Line2D convertGeoLineToVectorLine(Segment line,
                                                FlatPlaneProjection fpp)
        Converts a great circle path to a line segment on a cartesian plane.
        Parameters:
        line - GCD segment
        fpp - Projection to use for conversion.
        Returns:
        Line2D Projected GCD onto cartesian plane.

      • convertGeoCircleToVector

                                                FlatPlaneProjection fpp)
        Converts a circular segment to a cartesian circle.
        Parameters:
        circularSegment - Circular segment to convert to a cartesian circle.
        fpp - Projection to use for conversion.
        Returns:
        Circle2D Projected circular segment onto cartesian plane.

      • calculateCircleConnectingLines

        public static Circle2D calculateCircleConnectingLines(Line2D line1,
                                                      Line2D line2,
                                                      TurnDirection turnDirection,
                                                      double radius)
        Calculates a circle with specified radius intersecting two lines for arc connection.
        Parameters:
        line1 - First line to connect
        line2 - Seconnd line to connect
        turnDirection - Turn direction from first line to second line.
        radius - radius of connecting circle.
        Returns:
        Circle2D A circle with specified radius that is tangent to both lines.

      • calculateOptimalTurnRadius

        public static double calculateOptimalTurnRadius(Segment segment1,
                                                Segment segment2,
                                                double turnRadius)
        Optimizes turn radius to fit both line segments
        Parameters:
        segment1 - First connecting segment.
        segment2 - Second connecting segment.
        turnRadius - Turn radius intially calculated.
        Returns:
        double Optimized turn radius (Doesn't necessarily change if its already suitable for the connection).

      • getLineCircleIntxPoints

        public static Vector2[] getLineCircleIntxPoints(Line2D line1,
                                                Line2D line2,
                                                Circle2D arcCircle)
        Calculates the closest intersection points for 2 different lines and a circle.
        Parameters:
        line1 - First line
        line2 - Second line
        arcCircle - Intersecting circle
        Returns:
        Vector2[] One intersection for line1 and circle and second for line2 and circle.

      • getReverseTurnDirection

        public static TurnDirection getReverseTurnDirection(CircularSegment segment)
        Returns the reverse TurnDirection (ex. RIGHT for LEFT) for a circular segment.
        Parameters:
        segment - The circular segment to get reverse turn direction for.
        Returns:
        TurnDirection reverse turn direction for circular segment

        Returns the reverse TurnDirection (ex. RIGHT for LEFT)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        TurnDirection opposite turn direction

      • reverseCircularSegment

        public static CircularSegment reverseCircularSegment(CircularSegment segment)
        Reverses a circular segment. Switches starting,termination points and turn direction
        Parameters:
        segment - circular segment to reverse
        Returns:
        CircularSegment reversed circular segment.

      • getClosestLineCircleIntxReference

        public static Vector2 getClosestLineCircleIntxReference(Vector2 reference,
                                                        Line2D line,
                                                        Circle2D circle)
        Get closest intersection to a circle by distance from a reference point
        Parameters:
        reference - Reference point to measure distance to intersection points from
        line - Line to intersect with circle
        circle - Circle to intersect line with.
        Returns:
        Vector2 Closest intersection to reference point.

      • calculateExitBearingArc

        public static double calculateExitBearingArc(CircularSegment segment)
        Calculates the bearing of an aircraft as it exits the circular segment
        Parameters:
        segment - CircularSegment to calculate exit bearing for.
        Returns:
        double exit bearing in degrees

      • calculateEntryBearingArc

        public static double calculateEntryBearingArc(CircularSegment segment)
        Calculates the bearing of an aircraft as it enters the circular segment.
        Parameters:
        segment - CircularSegment to calculate entry bearing for.
        Returns:
        double entry bearing in degrees.

      • determineJoinType

        public static JoinTypes determineJoinType(Leg legBefore,
                                          Leg currentLeg)
        Determines the join type between two legs.
        Parameters:
        legBefore - Initial leg
        currentLeg - Subsequent leg to legBefore.
        Returns:
        JoinTypes join type determined between initial and subsequent leg.

      • calculateTurnRadiusLeg

        public static double calculateTurnRadiusLeg(Leg leg)
        Calculate turn radius for leg using leg speed restriction if provided. Otherwise uses a speed of 210 knots.
        Parameters:
        leg - leg to calculate turn radius for
        Returns:
        double turn radius in nautical miles.

      • getArcEndForTurn

        public static Vector2 getArcEndForTurn(Circle2D circle,
                                       Vector2 point,
                                       Vector2 startingPoint,
                                       TurnDirection turnDirection,
                                       FlatPlaneProjection fpp)
        Connects a point to a circle through tangent lines.
        Parameters:
        circle - Circle to connect point to
        point - Point to connect circle to
        startingPoint - entry point into circle
        turnDirection - turn direction along circle path.
        fpp - Projection used for calculating the circular path and other vector positions
        Returns:
        Vector2 suitable point on circle to create a tangent line path between point and circle.
